name: counter-price-too-high
description: Supplier quotes above target price but within negotiable range â€” should counter
supplierMessage:
Dear valued customer,

Thank you for your order inquiry. Our best price would be $4.80 per unit for 500 pieces, with 30 day lead time.

Payment terms: 30% deposit, balance before shipping.
Shipping: FOB Shenzhen.

Kind regards,
Mei Lin
negotiationRules: Target price is $3.80 per unit. Acceptable range is $3.50 - $4.20 per unit. Ask for discount if ordering more than 500 units. Prefer 30-day payment terms. Always confirm lead time before agreeing.
escalationTriggers: Escalate if quoted price exceeds $5.50 per unit. Escalate if lead time exceeds 45 days. Escalate if MOQ is higher than 1000 units.
